result.eng: A lot of work still needs to be done in the years ahead.
result.ga: tá neart oibre fós le déanamh sna blianta amach romhainn
result.orig: tá neart oibre fós le déanamh sna blianta amach romhainn
result.html: tá neart oibre fós le déanamh sna blianta amach romhainnA lot of work still needs to be done in the years ahead.
result.ponchtml: tá neart oibre fós le déanaṁ sna blianta amaċ roṁainnA lot of work still needs to be done in the years ahead.

result.eng: They say every group needs somebody to blame.
result.ga: deirtear go bhfuil gá le ceap milleáin ag gach grúpa
result.orig: deirtear go bhfuil gá le ceap milleáin ag gach grúpa
result.html: deirtear go bhfuil gá le ceap milleáin ag gach grúpaThey say every group needs somebody to blame.
result.ponchtml: deirtear go ḃfuil gá le ceap milleáin ag gaċ grúpaThey say every group needs somebody to blame.

result.eng: The needs are putting the blame on us.
result.ga: tá na meáin ag déanamh ceap milleáin asainn
result.orig: tá na meáin ag déanamh ceap milleáin asainn
result.html: tá na meáin ag déanamh ceap milleáin asainnThe needs are putting the blame on us.
result.ponchtml: tá na meáin ag déanaṁ ceap milleáin asainnThe needs are putting the blame on us.
